product_name: Mountain Khakis National Park Sign T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Featuring limited-edition, hand-drawn artwork and made with 100% organic cotton, the Mountain Khakis National Park Sign T-Shirt makes a statement about what's important on this planet. 100% certified organic cotton is grown with out chemical pesticides and synthetic fertilizers, and is not genetically engineered. Screenprint is made using water-based inks. Mountain Khakis National Park Sign T-Shirt has a casual fit.
short_description: Featuring limited-edition, hand-drawn artwork and made with 100% organic cotton, the Mountain Khakis National Park Sign T-Shirt makes a statement about what's important on this planet.
